articles.title: Jury says it's deadlocked in Danny Masterson rape trial - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Jurors at the rape trial of “That ’70s Show” star Danny Masterson  said Friday that they are deadlocked, but a judge told them they have not deliberated long enough for her to declare a mistrial.
